name: @activadee-ai/open-workflows
description: OpenCode plugin for AI-powered GitHub workflows: PR reviews, issue labeling, doc sync, and releases
author: activadee

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target bun --format esm -e @opencode-ai/plugin -e @opencode-ai/plugin/tool --minify && bun x tsc --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run clean && bun run build && bun run typecheck
